channel.title: git on Better BibTeX for Zotero
channel.description: Recent content in git on Better BibTeX for Zotero

item.title: Automatic export
item.description: When exporting using BBT you will be offered a new export option: Keep updated. Checking this option registers the export for automation; any changes to the collection or library you exported after you've completed the current export will trigger an automatic re-export to update the bib file. You can review/remove exports from the BBT preferences. While I've gone to some lengths to make sure performance is OK, don't go overboard with the number of auto-exports you have going.
